trends: There have been 32 other sightings in Bakersfield
There was one other sighting in Bakersfield on or around August 5th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsI reported strange lights and behavior in the sky over Bakersfield yesterday, but I think I solved the problem. I suspect that someone had been flying a large kite with LEDs attached to it. I suspect that the string holding the kite broke, and the kite actually flattened out and was carried off by the wind. I also suspect the people that were driving the cars following the object were actually the people that were flying the kite, and they were trying to recover it. I believe their intention was to perpetrate a hoax, and I feel silly for falling for it, but I had never even knew that it was possible to do something like this until I did some further research. Sorry for the false report, and thank you for your time.
